articles.content: Two popular muralists from West London are leading the way in painting a giant mural dedicated to the late Queen Elizabeth II in honour of her 70 years of service, which came to an end on September 8… [+2891 chars]

articles.title: Javier Marías: modern literature’s great philosopher of everyday absurdity - The Guardian
articles.description: The author of 15 novels, a perennial contender for the Nobel prize, and the most recent King of Redonda, the Spanish writer was an acute observer of the games we all play
articles.content: Perhaps because Javier Marías felt deeply the absurdity of everyday life and had the sense that history is a game played out with dreadful consequences, he became interested in two pursuits that echo… [+4346 chars]

articles.author: Jason Chester
articles.title: Britney Spears reveals she will NEVER perform again - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a rambling post that has since been deleted, 40-year old Spears bemoaned her previous experiences as a touring artist, as well as the preparation required for each show.
articles.content:
Britney Spears says she will never perform live again and claimed she is 'traumatized for life' after being humiliated into working with the 'tiniest' backup dancers while on tour. 
In a rambling po… [+6658 chars]
